name: I've Been Busy Being Dead
description:
The only way to escape is to enslave another. 

Eh? Was that too dark? *cough-cough* Alright, control a cute ghost, haunt various objects to scare people to death, thus stealing their freedom! Be sure to hide in the walls for them not to post your picture on Twitter, yeah, otherwise that will be gross.

This game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 47 with a theme: Stuck in a loop. All feedback is welcome and very appreciated, hope you had fun playing it!

Art by Doctor Hummer (check out his games too!)
